title: LeBron James, Browns, Magic Johnson, and fan bases
itunes:title: LeBron James, Browns, Magic Johnson, and fan bases
description:
Today Colin discusses why Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James keeps failing as a leader, the Cleveland Browns over compensating, why former Lakers President Magic Johnson may have quit, and who his top fan bases are. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Chris Broussard, Bill Plaschke, and Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
